data.title: Lads 2 Leaders
data.meta_description: The Convention Theme for 2025 is, "Meant for Good."Bible Bowl Book for 2025 is, "Genesis." Lads 2 Leaders Teaching students to do “Bible things in Bible ways” About L2L Since our foundation in 1968, the mission of Lads to Leaders/Leaderettes has been to develop youth into Christian leaders. From a group of eight boys in
data.text: Since our foundation in 1968, the mission of Lads to Leaders/Leaderettes has been to develop youth into Christian leaders. From a group of eight boys in that first year to more than 20,000 today, our mission has remained the same.
